com.differ.differcore.service

Class DiffServiceImpl

  • com.differ.differcore.service.DiffServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiffService

    @Service
public class DiffServiceImpl
implements DiffService

    Implementation of interface DiffService interface.

    Looking changes between versions with Google Gson library. It uses 'com.google.common.collect.Maps.difference' for search. Jsons are flattened first for a more accurate search. Jsons expand back after search.

    See Also:
    interface DiffService

    • Constructor Detail

                       com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper,
                       @NotNull

                       @NotNull
                       MapTransformerService mapTransformerService)

        Is used for autowire required beans.

        Parameters:
        objectMapper - instance of jackson 'ObjectMapper' for deserialization json from file;
        versionService - implementation of interface VersionService interface;
        mapTransformerService - implementation of interface MapTransformerService interface;

    • Method Detail

      • difference

        @NotNull
public Either<com.differ.differcore.models.Difference> difference(@Nullable
                                                                           java.lang.String penultimate,
                                                                           @Nullable
                                                                           java.lang.String last)

        Looks for changes in two specified versions.

        Searches penultimate and last versions in interface VersionService. If penultimate version is specified then it will be looked up interface VersionService else will be invoked VersionService.getPenultimateVersionFile. If last version is specified then it will be looked up interface VersionService else will be invoked VersionService.getLastVersionFile. If at least one file was not found then will be returned class Either.Error with appropriate error message otherwise move on.

        After all the necessary files have been found, a search is made for changes in this json data. class Difference object is the result of search.

        Parameters:
        penultimate - penultimate version of the API.
        last - last version of the API.
        Returns:
        The result of comparing two versions. If all is fun then will be returned class Either.Success else will be returned class Either.Error with message or exception.
        See Also:
        penultimate, last, interface VersionService, interface VersionService, VersionService.getPenultimateVersionFile, interface VersionService, VersionService.getLastVersionFile, class Either.Error, class Difference
